api.invalid: Invalid data returned by API server
page.403.title: 403: Forbidden
page.403.not_allowed: You are not allowed to view this page...
page.404.title: 404: Not found
page.404.description: The page you are looking for cannot be found...
page.account.success_save: Changes to your account were successfully saved.
page.account.2fa_scan: Scan the QRCode below with your application
page.account.2fa_manual: Manually add the secret key in your application
page.account.2fa_enabled: 2-factor authentication has been enabled for your account
page.account.2fa_already_enabled: 2-factor authentication is already enabled on your account
page.account.2fa_disabled: 2-factor authentication has been deactivated for your account
page.account.2fa_disable_desc: By disabling 2-factor authentication on your account your account will be less secure. You will no longer be asked for one-time password to log in and all security tokens will be remove from your account.
page.account.name: Full Name
page.account.groups_edit_title: Groups are not for access control, they are used to group submissions of users of the same group together. When you submit a file, all groups you are member of are assigned to the submission.
page.account.api_quota_edit_title: Maximum number of concurrent API call that can run inside the API server. It is the equivalent to the number of threads a script runnning under your acocunt can have connected to the API server at the same time.
page.account.submission_quota_edit_title: Maximum number of submissions processing under you account. Only submissions executed via the submit API and the UI count towards the quota, submissions started using ingest API do not.
page.dashboard.title: Dashboard
page.locked.title: Waiting for approval...
page.locked.auto_notify: System administrators have been notified. You will receive an email once your account is active.
page.locked.contact_admin: Contact your system administrators so they can activate your account.
page.login.reset.done: An email was sent to your address with instructions on how to reset your password.
page.login.reset_now.redirect: You will be redirected to the login screen in a few seconds...
page.login.signup.done: An email was sent to your address with the final instrucstions to create a new account.
page.login.signup.completed: New account registration is now complete, you can now login with your account
page.login.other: Or sign in as a different user...
page.login.securitytoken: Please touch the flashing security token
page.login.securitytoken.error: Security token was invalid or operation was cancelled. Try with One Time Password instead...
page.login.securitytoken.unavailable: Cannot use security token on this server. Use One Time Password instead...
page.submission.subtitle: total submission(s)
page.tos.agreed: You've already agreed to the terms of service...
